article_title: Wagons Circle On Blue Cross And Blue Shield Tax Exemptions

article_metadata.description: Tax exemptions of profit-making health care businesses, long controversial in an industry that is taking hold of a greater share of the U.S. economy, are coming under fire once again. This time, it’s nonprofit health insurance companies like Blue Shield of California, which recently lost its state income tax exemption after [...]
